title: S5 Ep12: Do schools change our religious attitudes?
itunes:title: Do schools change our religious attitudes?
description: Does compulsory religious education make us more likely to believe as adults, and does it make us more ethical? Ludger Woessmann, Larissa Zierow, and Benjamin Arold explain to Tim Phillips what educational reform in Germany can tell us.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
